summary: Provides a PyTorch‑compatible dataset class that downloads the QM9 molecular collection, converts each molecule into a DGL graph with atom nodes and bond edges (using a configurable distance cutoff and optional edge functions), and supplies atomic features and a selectable set of regression targets such as dipole moment, polarizability, orbital energies, and thermodynamic properties. The class also manages caching of processed graphs.
business_intent: Supports development and evaluation of graph neural network models for predicting quantum‑chemical properties of small molecules, facilitating research and applications in computational chemistry, drug discovery, and materials design.
